Articles.Content:
True world history

The user below me goes to klein oak

Nope, I live in MTL

The user below me trust humanity

False, Ponies can't trust humans.

The user below me is either a blue dragon, YAYing fluttershy or an Alien Invader from Metal slug, or whatever Briansun1 is

true (grey knight space marine)

the user below me is a pony

Nope.

The user below is not the user twice above.

Nope

The user below me will say false

True.

The user below me Isn't a Brony

PARADOXES! If I say TRUE, how can it be true if it is false. If I say FALSE, it is true! I hate you!

"...don'tthinkaboutitdon'tthinkaboutitdon'tthinkaboutit..."

The next user gets what I quoted.

Flase

The user below trusted Weathley when he said that there was a pony farm in the bottom of the pit

Yes. Yes I did. (But just for fun, when I was going through it for the 5th time.)

The next user is a Portal fan.

False, never played portal 2, but I would so fall for it

the User below me does not like overrated youtubers

Depends on who you think of as overrated

The user below me is annoyed by the random spurs of pony pictures.

False

The user below me would look at a thread of me reacting to MLP episodes.

False, it might offend me with Anti-brony remarks.

The user below me has a 50% chance of being Theattackcorgi

True

The yser below me would watch the mlp reaction if i said its gonna be non biased and not me saying it sucks to everything(hey im giving you a oppertunity to possibly have me on your "brony" side (ppppfffffff.....)

Er, not sure how to respond to that.

The user below understands quantum mechanics.

False.

The user below me would visit that fourm so that I dont get all sad cause people hate me

or

The user below me is starwhip.

True. True.

The user below uses Blender3D

False

The user below me knows what they say...

True,

You know what they say at the RDF?

Where everypony is usefull to us!

The user below me is disgusted of this refference

True

The user below me is British.

False.

The user below me will explain the RDF reference.

True, and in image!

The user below now understand

True

The user below me understands that a Corgi brain cant get every single reference.

True, you just have to read/see/listen the original and/or watch their related episode (or read the wiki page in my sig)

The user below me is tired of me explaining everythings.
